item.title: Creator Companion
item.description: Your browser does not support the video tag. Try it out here. Link to heading Code for this project. Link to heading Introduction: Link to heading Podcasts offer a wealth of information and entertainment, but navigating through extensive libraries of episodes to find specific content can be challenging. That’s where the Creator Companion app comes in. Designed as a search engine for “The Colin and Samir Show” podcast, the app uses advanced language models and vector search technology to help users locate and retrieve relevant segments from the podcast.

item.title: Podcast Episodes
item.description: Here is a list of some of my favorite Podcast Episodes (in no particular order): Link to heading #1. reCAPTCHA and Duolingo: Luis von Ahn Link to heading #2. Lord of the Rankings Link to heading

item.title: Books
item.description: Here are some of my favorite books I have read (mostly listend to): Link to heading 1. Outliers by Malcolm Gladwell Link to heading Outliers by Malcolm Gladwell is a really interesting book that shows how success isn’t just about being really talented or working really hard - it’s also about having the right opportunities and circumstances. 2. The Creative Act: A Way of Being by Rick Rubin Link to heading The Creative Act by Rick Rubin is an inspiring essay that offers valuable insights into the creative process, emphasizing the importance of authenticity, collaboration, and experimentation in unlocking one’s creative potential.

item.title: One Byte: Pizza Review Analysis
item.description: One Byte: Pizza Review Analysis Link to heading Here is the Code for this project. Link to heading Welcome to One Byte, a data analysis project that analyzes the data from Dave Portnoy’s One Bite Pizza series. The One Bite Pizza reviews started in 2014 and have really gained popularity since 2016, with a new review being uploaded almost daily since then. As a fan of pizza, I have always been searching for the perfect slice.
